channel.title: Inflator Tool is killing Gmod.
channel.description:
Whenever I use the Inflator Tool, is crashes Garrys Mod all the time, When I inflate something, it is fine for a while, but then the game just crashes.
I've reinstalled the game.. No luck..
Any suggestions?
I did think if someone could upload their inflator.lua that would probably be really helpful.
Thanks. :smiley:

item.description:
I’ve reinstalled it again… And I think it’s fine now… So it must have been some sort of conflicting addon.

Thanks for the help. It was very orgasmic.

I don’t like GMod.
every time I start it something doesn’t work…
At this time I can’t spawn Lamps

Read full topic

item.title: Inflator Tool is killing Gmod.
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
Clean Gmod. If that doesn’t work, don’t play it for a few weeks or until an update is released.

Last year, my zombines broke and the game crashed when you spawned them, and the year before that, the sound was disabled, and a whoole bunch of other stuff.

These problems tend to fix themselves eventually, so just don’t use inflator.

Read full topic

item.title: Inflator Tool is killing Gmod.
item.dc:creator: Collision
item.description:
Whats your system like?

If it’s low end, your PC may just be stressing when you use that tool.

But yeah, as said, best to check Facepunch first, as bad as it is, its the best place to look for an answer.

Read full topic

item.title: Inflator Tool is killing Gmod.
item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
λdam:

Whenever I use the Inflator Tool, is crashes Garrys Mod all the time, When I inflate something, it is fine for a while, but then the game just crashes.

How long is “a while”?

Gmod wouldn’t spontaneously crash and I sincerely doubt it has anything to do with the inflator tool.

You’d be better off asking on facepunch forums… even if they are a bunch of cock-knobs over there.:fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: Inflator Tool is killing Gmod.
item.dc:creator: popsUlfr
item.description:
And that’s what happens kids when you try to inflate penises…

Did you get any error messages? Why do you think our “inflator.lua” is different from yours :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Inflator Tool is killing Gmod.
item.dc:creator: Maxaxle
item.description:
To reinstall:
-“Delete Local Content” in Steam
-Go to C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\Your Steam Name Here\garrysmod and delete it.
-Install Gmod.

If it doesn’t work, IDK what to do.

Read full topic
